content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) used for smelting iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) used for smelting copper ore.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing automation research.
- ElectricityGroup connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (9.5, 6.5), and (10.5, 7.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(-10.5, 18.5) with connection points at (-10.5, 16.0) and (-10.5, 21.0); warnings: not connected to power network, no input liquid, no fluid present in connections.
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); warning: out of fuel; now associated with fluid_system [82614] and holding approximately 190 units of water (~15°); provides steam output at (-7.5, 24.5).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) with connection point at (-9.5, 23.5); now associated with fluid_system [82614] and holding roughly 99.25 units of water (~15°).
- Manual Fuel Feeding System represented by a Wooden Chest at position(-4.5, 25.5).
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 82614, status: WORKING.
   • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 82613, status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system 82626, status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system 82625, status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 82621, status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system 82630, status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 82629, status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 82632, status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 82633, status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system 82634, status: EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Inventory Attribute Usage:
  - Use only supported inventory attributes when accessing inventory items.

• Pipeline Connection and Fluid System Consistency:
  - Repeated connection attempts to the steam engine using fluid_system identifiers (81950, 82034, 82116, 82200, 82282, 82366, 82448, 82532) failed to locate candidate pipe groups near Position(-5.5, 19.5).
  - Verify that the fluid_system identifier corresponds to an active, correctly positioned pipe group.
  - After repeated failures, update connection parameters according to the current pipeline network configuration (evidenced by the active fluid_system 82614) to ensure proper synchronization.
